entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 07:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -35.8°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with a few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
